WorkItem.Description:
Item parsing has a glitch.
 
When parsing information using Relevant Armory you get different information then Refresh Item Data from Armory.
 
Also some items get parsed with messed up info.
Deadly Gladiator's Mooncloth Hood gives infor like PvP item sold by Leeni quot;Smileyquot; Smalls at Netherstorm

Comments.Message: Please list every single item you see as not getting parsed correctly (not just what's in the default cache, what happened AFTER you performed a cache refresh). Without a list, we have no way to confirm your issues and fix them. This issue will be closed on Wednesday without further information.
Deadly Gladiator's Mooncloth Hood seems to correctly parse from wowhead (which is what I'm usually using), I'll check what's going on with armory.

Armory data is wrong. If you check http://www.wowarmory.com/item-info.xml?i=41853 you'll see it still lists pvp vendors as giving this item, even though they actually only give furious gear now. Seems like the only error here is bad handling of quotes.

I will note that for next time. As it was, I was working on filters for all the different classes so I am not sure when it was I noticed that issue or what items had it. As for the "quote" issue, I see that now, but at first it looked like it was just all messed up.
